docs.snippet: “Rolling Stone influenced a generation. That it can no longer survive on its own suggests that something about our culture has been lost.”

docs.snippet: Groups that reject established climate science can use the search engine’s advertising business to their advantage, gaming the system to find a mass platform for false or misleading claims.
